description: Summary metrics about kube-state-metrics v2 version(https://github.com/kubernetes/kube-state-metrics); Referenced 6417

targets.expr:
WITH(
    commonVars = {cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"},
    deploymentName = avg by (deployment, pod) (
        label_replace(kube_pod_owner{commonVars, owner_kind="ReplicaSet", owner_name=~"$deployment.*"}, "replicaset", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)") 
        * on (replicaset) group_left(deployment) avg(label_replace(kube_replicaset_owner{commonVars, owner_name=~"$deployment"}, "deployment", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, deployment) 
    ),
    containerRequest = avg by (deployment, container) (deploymentName * on (pod) group_right(deployment) avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",pod=~"$deployment.*", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, container))
)
containerRequest * 1000

WITH(
    commonVars = {cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"},
    deploymentName = avg by (deployment, pod) (
        label_replace(kube_pod_owner{commonVars, owner_kind="ReplicaSet", owner_name=~"$deployment.*"}, "replicaset", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)") 
        * on (replicaset) group_left(deployment) avg(label_replace(kube_replicaset_owner{commonVars, owner_name=~"$deployment"}, "deployment", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, deployment) 
    ),
    containerLimit = avg by (deployment, container) (deploymentName * on (pod) group_right(deployment) avg(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",pod=~"$deployment.*", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (pod, container))
)
containerLimit * 1000

WITH(
    commonVars = {cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"},
    deploymentName = avg by (deployment, pod) (
        label_replace(kube_pod_owner{commonVars, owner_kind="ReplicaSet", owner_name=~"$deployment.*"}, "replicaset", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)") 
        * on (replicaset) group_left(deployment) avg(label_replace(kube_replicaset_owner{commonVars, owner_name=~"$deployment"}, "deployment", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, deployment) 
    ),
    containerUsage = avg by (deployment, container) (deploymentName * on (pod) group_right(deployment) sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"$deployment.*",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod,container))
)
containerUsage * 1000

WITH(
    commonVars = {cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"},
    deploymentName = avg by (deployment, pod) (
        label_replace(kube_pod_owner{commonVars, owner_kind="ReplicaSet", owner_name=~"$deployment.*"}, "replicaset", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)") 
        * on (replicaset) group_left(deployment) avg(label_replace(kube_replicaset_owner{commonVars, owner_name=~"$deployment"}, "deployment", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, deployment) 
    ),
    containerRequest = avg by (deployment, container) (deploymentName * on (pod) group_right(deployment) avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",pod=~"$deployment.*", namespace=~"$namespace",container!="istio-proxy"}) by (container, pod))
)
containerRequest

WITH(
    commonVars = {cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"},
    deploymentName = avg by (deployment, pod) (
        label_replace(kube_pod_owner{commonVars, owner_kind="ReplicaSet", owner_name=~"$deployment.*"}, "replicaset", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)") 
        * on (replicaset) group_left(deployment) avg(label_replace(kube_replicaset_owner{commonVars, owner_name=~"$deployment"}, "deployment", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, deployment) 
    ),
    containerLimit = avg by (deployment, container) (deploymentName * on (pod) group_right(deployment) avg(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory",pod=~"$deployment.*", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container, pod))
)
containerLimit

WITH(
    commonVars = {cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"},
    deploymentName = avg by (deployment, pod) (
        label_replace(kube_pod_owner{commonVars, owner_kind="ReplicaSet", owner_name=~"$deployment.*"}, "replicaset", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)") 
        * on (replicaset) group_left(deployment) avg(label_replace(kube_replicaset_owner{commonVars, owner_name=~"$deployment"}, "deployment", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, deployment) 
    ),
    containerUsage = avg by (deployment, container) (deploymentName * on (pod) group_right(deployment) avg(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"$deployment.*",namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (container, pod))
)
containerUsage

WITH(
    commonVars = {cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"},
    deploymentName = avg by (deployment, pod) (
        label_replace(kube_pod_owner{commonVars, owner_kind="ReplicaSet", owner_name=~"$deployment.*"}, "replicaset", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)") 
        * on (replicaset) group_left(deployment) avg(label_replace(kube_replicaset_owner{commonVars, owner_name=~"$deployment"}, "deployment", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, deployment)
    ),
    podStatusPhase = sum by (deployment, phase) (deploymentName * on (pod) group_right(deployment) avg(kube_pod_status_phase{commonVars, pod=~"$deployment.*", phase="Running"}) by (pod, phase))
)
podStatusPhase

WITH(
    commonVars = {cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"},
    deploymentName = avg by (deployment, pod) (
        label_replace(kube_pod_owner{commonVars, owner_kind="ReplicaSet", owner_name=~"$deployment.*"}, "replicaset", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)") 
        * on (replicaset) group_left(deployment) avg(label_replace(kube_replicaset_owner{commonVars, owner_name=~"$deployment"}, "deployment", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, deployment)
    ),
    podStatusPhase = sum by (deployment, phase) (deploymentName * on (pod) group_right(deployment) avg(kube_pod_status_phase{commonVars, pod=~"$deployment.*", phase="Pending"}) by (pod, phase))
)
podStatusPhase

WITH(
    commonVars = {cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"},
    deploymentName = avg by (deployment, pod) (
        label_replace(kube_pod_owner{commonVars, owner_kind="ReplicaSet", owner_name=~"$deployment.*"}, "replicaset", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)") 
        * on (replicaset) group_left(deployment) avg(label_replace(kube_replicaset_owner{commonVars, owner_name=~"$deployment"}, "deployment", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, deployment)
    ),
    podStatusClbo = sum by (deployment, phase) (deploymentName * on (pod) group_right(deployment) increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{commonVars, pod=~"$deployment.*"}[5m]))
)
podStatusClbo

WITH(
    commonVars = {cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"},
    deploymentName = avg by (deployment, pod) (
        label_replace(kube_pod_owner{commonVars, owner_kind="ReplicaSet", owner_name=~"$deployment.*"}, "replicaset", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)") 
        * on (replicaset) group_left(deployment) avg(label_replace(kube_replicaset_owner{commonVars, owner_name=~"$deployment"}, "deployment", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, deployment)
    ),
    podStatusPhase = sum by (deployment, phase) (deploymentName * on (pod) group_right(deployment) avg(kube_pod_status_phase{commonVars, pod=~"$deployment.*", phase="Failed"}) by (pod, phase))
)
podStatusPhase

WITH(
    commonVars = {cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"},
    deploymentName = avg by (deployment, pod) (
        label_replace(kube_pod_owner{commonVars, owner_kind="ReplicaSet", owner_name=~"$deployment.*"}, "replicaset", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)") 
        * on (replicaset) group_left(deployment) avg(label_replace(kube_replicaset_owner{commonVars, owner_name=~"$deployment"}, "deployment", "$1", "owner_name", "(.*)")) by (replicaset, deployment)
    ),
    podStatusPhase = sum by (deployment, phase) (deploymentName * on (pod) group_right(deployment) avg(kube_pod_status_phase{commonVars, pod=~"$deployment.*", phase="Unknown"}) by (pod, phase))
)
podStatusPhase

panels.description: get rate of http_request_duration_seconds_count for last 30 minutes at 15 seconds resolution
panels.title: Request Per Minute

targets.expr: (sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{pod=~"$deployment.*", code=~"4.."}[1m])) by (code, handler, method, pod)) / (sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count[1m])) by (code, handler, method, pod)) * 100

(sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{pod=~"$deployment.*", code=~"5.."}[1m])) by (code, handler, method, pod)) / (sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count[1m])) by (code, handler, method, pod)) * 100

panels.title: Job last success time from now

title: Kubernetes Dashboard
